page.title: 04Shopping at Pontypridd
page.content: Pontypridd is the main shopping centre of the Taff-Ely borough.Taff St,the main shopping street,has a one-way traffic system.There are a few small family-owned businesses and many famous name stores such as Woolworths, Boots,Marks and Spencers.Recently, the main hotel(New Inn)was demolished to make way for additional stores-Chelsea Girl,Dolcis,WHSmith and others. Wednesday and Saturday are Market days at Pontypridd with open air stalls lining the streets-stalls selling sewing materials,jewelry,clothes, bed-linen,crockery,leather goods. The market attracts crowds from considerable distances.There are plans being considered for a new-look town centre which will enable pedestrians to walk freely and so avoid some of the traffic problems which now exist. (By a pupil of Trefforest CP school)
